Package it.polimi.se2019.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionManager  
    AvailableActions
    This class builds the message object that the ActionManager in Controller builds and sends over to the Client to choose from In the Normal 1 combination (move, move, move) you will only use the arrivalCell object In the Normal 2 combination (move,(move) grab) you will only use the arrivalCell object In the Normal 3 combination ((move), shoot) you will use the arrivalCell object and an object for each card in your hand that indicates if you can use it and in which way The client will then build an "answer object" containing his selection
    ChosenAction
    this class is going to send back the objects it received to "select" them
    Controller  
    DestinationCell  
    GameStats  
    IntegerComparator  
    KillShotTrackerManager  
    MapManager  
    PlayerManager  
    PowerupManager  
    ShootManager  
    SingleCardActions
    with a certain guncard you can: - use one, two or three effects in a certain order - select one or more targets from a list of players - move (yourself or others) by a given number of cells - inflict damage to players in a certain cell - inflict damage to one or more players in a certain cell Usage of effectsOrder: examples: {{"Base","Optional1","Optional2"}, {"Base","Optional2", "Optional1"}} or {{"Base"}, {"Alternative"}} meaning that you can either use one or the other.
    SingleEffectsCombinationActions
    This class creates objects that represent the things a player must choose from to use a certain effect
    TurnManager
